I was crawling using Heritrix 1.14.4 using 5000 seed URLs. I used the defau=
lt deciding rules in all parts except the writer. I used the mirrorwriter a=
nd only download application/pdf files to our archive. 

The crawling progr=
esses fast between 0-90% but after that the crawl becomes very slow. Partic=
ularly, the number of active threads is very low. Out of the 50 threads, on=
ly 1-5 are active. How does this happen? Why are there so many idle threads=
?
